basics.name: Abishek Ilango

basics.summary: 3+ years of experience building and maintaining complex web and web-native apps using React and a vast ecosystem of UI libraries, testing frameworks, and build tools. Contributes to open-source, picks up new skills quickly, thrives on cross-functional teams, serves as a force multiplier, aims to 1.1x the team's output daily, and spearheads UI/UX and DX projects.

work.name: DarioHealth
work.summary:
*   **Tech Stack: React, Redux, Material UI, CSS Modules, Sass, GraphQL, React Query, Ionic Capacitor, Mocha, Chai, Selenium, AWS, Firebase, MongoDB, Auth0, CircleCI.**
*   **Designed and developed** the **front end** of a **custom operations dashboard**, which led to streamlined ops workflow and **reduced time-to-response from 1 day to instant** in certain use cases.
*   **Established best practices** and **mentored junior team members** to improve codebase maintainability and app scalability.
*   Delivered **HIPPA-compliant, WCAG 2.2 AAA conformant UX** by **collaborating closely with stakeholders** in various time zones.

work.name: DarioHealth
work.summary:
*   **Created web-native Android and iOS app** stack from the existing web app using **Ionic Capacitor** runtime.
    *   This enabled the **reuse of web code for native** platforms and **tripled user acquisition,** with approximately **80% of users exclusively utilizing mobile apps.**
*   **Migrated** the app from **AngularJS to React**. This modernized the codebase and **decreased development time by 15%** which helped develop the app faster and better.
*   **Created a custom token system** for typography and color and enabled the generation of **web and native apps within 2-3 days** for any Dario partner.
*   Implemented app **localization using i18next** for Spanish users. This **expanded** the **user base by 8%.**
*   **Implemented adaptive screening** via an interactive chat interface to assess and diagnose users. This increased the percentage of users screened and **cut assessment time by approx. 50%.**
*   **Fortified the app** by fixing vulnerabilities, updating affected packages, and following the **latest security practices,** which resulted in a **100% reduction of known vulnerabilities.**
